name: Diamonds in the Rough (itch) (jargalo)
description:
Have you ever wanted to date a rock? Like, not physically dating, I mean. Not in terms of age. Wait, does that make sense?

This is a short visual novel in the form of a game show,  where you try to identify rocks so you can date them. Like, romantically. Made as a Geoscience final, so somewhat aimed at Geoscientists but everyone likes rocks, right? RIGHT? Exactly!

5 endings.
